text: thảmị t̄hụng mị̀mī h̄mū̀b̂ān sạk h̄æ̀ng h̄nụ̀ng ṣ̄rạthṭhā doythī̀ kār ṣ̄rạthṭhā k̄hxng phwk k̄heā ca xảnwy prayochn̒ kæ̀ phwk k̄heā nxkcāk klùm chn k̄hxng yū nu s̄ meụ̄̀x phwk k̄heā ṣ̄rạthṭhā reā dị̂ pldpelụ̄̂xng kār lngthos̄ʹ xạn xạpyṣ̄ cāk phwk k̄heā nı kār mī chīwit nı lok nī̂ læa reā dị̂ yụd welā raya h̄nụ̀ng kæ̀ phwk k̄heā
